title: 'Armed And Dangerous' Murder Suspect's Car Found In LA County, Suspect At Large
description: The Washington man, believed to be in LA County, is wanted in connection with a double stabbing and served time for a machete attack.
content:
Alexander Lee Rogers, 51, of Longview, Washington is wanted in connection with the murder of Dawn Peters, 64, and the attempted murder of Andrew Peters, 73, according to the Longview Police Department. Authorities previously said Rogers, who is considered armed and dangerous, was likely still in Washington. But on Monday afternoon, authorities in Los Angeles County said Rogers may now be in the Southland.

His car was found parked on the 23000 block of Calabasas Road, just off the 101 Freeway near Mulholland Drive and Valley Circle Boulevard, according to the Malibu/Lost Hills Sheriff's Station. "The suspect may still be in the surrounding area," deputies said. "If you see the suspect, call 9-1-1, do not approach or attempt to contact the suspect."

Dawn and Andrew Peters were found stabbed in a home in the southwestern Washington city at around noon on Aug. 5, KIRO reported. Rogers was publicly named as the suspect the next day.

"It's really important for us that the public knows this guy is dangerous. He's shown a propensity for violence. We believe he's likely to commit violence again," Longview police Capt. Brandon McNew told the station last week.

He got out of prison 10 months ago after serving over two decades for burglary and assault charges. The sentence stemmed from a 2002 incident in which Rogers attacked two people with a machete and stole one of their cars, KGW reported. After Rogers was named as the suspect in last week's murder, Longview police shared photos of him captured the day the Peters were found stabbed, authorities said. The photos were captured by police body cameras during an unrelated interaction earlier that morning outside a grocery store, according to Longview police. Rogers is described as a 6-foot-2-inch-tall man weighing 190 pounds. He was believed to be traveling in a partially spray-painted black BMW with Washington license plate BNU8712, police said.
summary: Alexander Lee Rogers, a 51-year-old man from Longview, Washington, is wanted in connection with the murder of Dawn Peters, 64, and the attempted murder of Andrew Peters, 73. Rogers, who is considered armed and dangerous, may now be in Los Angeles County. His car was found parked on the 23000 block of Calabasas Road near Mulholland Drive and Valley Circle Boulevard. He was named as the suspect the next day. The suspect, who served over two decades for burglary and assault charges, is believed to be traveling in a partially spray-painted black BMW with Washington license plate BNU8712.
shortSummary: Alexander Lee Rogers, considered armed and dangerous for murder and attempted murder, is on the run from Longview, Washington, after his car was found parked in LA County.

Vi använder cookies och data för att
- leverera och underhålla Googles tjänster
- spåra avbrott och skydda mot spam, bedrägeri och otillåten användning
- mäta målgruppsengagemang och webbplatsstatistik så att vi kan analysera hur våra tjänster används och förbättra tjänsternas kvalitet.
Om du väljer knappen Godkänn alla använder vi även cookies och data för att
- utveckla och förbättra nya tjänster
- leverera annonser och mäta hur effektiva de är
- visa anpassat innehåll utifrån dina inställningar
- visa anpassade annonser utifrån dina inställningar
Om du väljer knappen Avvisa alla använder vi inte cookies i dessa ytterligare syften.
Innehåll och annonser utan anpassning påverkas bland annat av vad du tittar på för tillfället och din plats (annonser visas utifrån din ungefärliga plats). Innehåll och annonser med anpassning kan även omfatta sådant som videorekommendationer, en anpassad YouTube Hem-sida och anpassade annonser utifrån tidigare aktivitet, till exempel vad du tittar på och söker efter på YouTube. Vi använder även cookies och data för att anpassa upplevelsen efter lämplighet för din målgrupp, om tillämpligt.
Välj knappen Fler alternativ för mer information, till exempel om hur du hanterar dina integritetsinställningar. Du kan även besöka g.co/privacytools när som helst.

argos_summary: Alexander Lee Rogers, 51, is wanted for the murder of 64-year-old Dawn Peters and the attempted murder of 73-year-old Andrew Peters in Longview, Washington. Authorities believe he may now be in Los Angeles County, where his car was found parked. Rogers, who has a violent criminal history, is considered armed and dangerous, and the public is advised to call 911 if he is spotted.
